attributes.action: Dredging rivers in the yorkshire area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dredging rivers in the Yorkshire area to ensure that slit in the rivers is not blocking the flow of water. Dredging increases the depth of the river by removing the material deposited at the bottom of normal flow, by removing this could reduce the risks of Sheffield and Rotherham flooding as bad as seen on 25/06/07.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
